headline: MICROMANIPULATOR SEMI-AUTOMATIC PROBER
specstable:
Manufacturer Micromanipulator
Model 6640
Wafer Size Range
Set Size 150 mm
Microscope Type Stereo Zoom
Vacuum Chuck
Diameter 6.0000 in (152.40 mm)
Plating Material Gold Plated Brass
Vacuum Required 20.00 in Hg (507.99 mm Hg)
Interface RS 232
Other Information B&L Stereo Zoom 7 Microscope 10 to 70X
Vacuum Chuck
  • Flatness +-.0005"
  • Electrical isolation exceeds 500 mghohms at 500 VDC
  • Electrically connected via coax cable to BNC at rear of machine

    Fine Lift Control
  • Resolution: 0.3 micron per degree of revolution
  • Range: 0.5"
Power Requirements 120/240 V 15.0 A 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 24.000 in (61.0 cm)
Depth 24.000 in (61.0 cm)
Height 22.000 in (55.9 cm)
Weight 151 lb (68 kg)
